verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We exalt Thee,
We exalt Thee,
We exalt Thee, Oh Lord.
We exalt Thee,
We exalt Thee,
We exalt Thee, Oh Lord.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For Thou, oh Lord, art high above all the earth.
Thou art exalted far above all gods.
For Thou, oh Lord, art high above all the earth.
Thou art exalted far above all gods.
